    • createGUI

      private void createGUI()
      Creates the base frame for the gui, and adds the Lobby panel. It also creates the guiController object

    • handleNewBoardStateMessage

      public void handleNewBoardStateMessage​(NewBoardStateMessage message)
      updates the state of the board maintained by the user's gui. If the game has already started, and therefore the GameWindow has already been created, the board shown is updated.
      Specified by:
      handleNewBoardStateMessage in class View
      Parameters:
      message - contains the new state of the board
